Service Details: - Provides services for children under 6, and for their families and/or caregivers - On RASP list and BCBA - ABA approach with developmental strategies - Consultant coordinates with SLP and OT for programming - Focus on social communication and interaction, behavior and self-regulation, play skills - In-home and learning centre both available - Interventionists trained to work under consultant 1:1 with child utilizing behavior plan and centre programming
Eligibility: Ages: 5 year(s) and underEligible participants must have a diagnosis under the Autism Spectrum by a registered mental health practitioner * eligible participants will meet with Consultant to determine program needs
How to Apply: Parents or caregivers to contact Behaviour Consultant for an intake
Cost: - The MOSAIK Learning Centre and Autism Therapy is offered to Children under 6 years old and their families on a fee-for-service basis - Funding is available by application for those with a diagnosis under the Autism Spectrum through the Autism Funding Unit: Ministry of Children and Family Development for purchasing autism intervention services
Address & Map: INvue2040 Springfield Rd, Ste 103Kelowna, BC     V1Y 9N7View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: Fully Accessible - Ground level access off of Springfield Road
